--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Wildrider looked back, then looked complex at Blindchaos' giggling.
> "What's his problem?" He said reffering to BLindchaos, but asking
> Dominjoe.

::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    "Somebody spiked his energon..." she replied with a roll of her 
optics, "...with too much of the good stuff the day he rolled off the 
assembly line." She waved a hand dismissively in Blindchaos's 
direction. "Don't mind him. He can be as annoying as hell but he's a 
fine warrior." 
    Blindchaos snorted at her words.
    "I'm not a fighter." he griped.
    Domnijoe gritted her teeth. She turned to Wildrider, trying to 
control her growing anger towards Blindchaos.
    "His specialty is torture." she said calmly. "Get on his good side 
now and you won't have to see his stupid grin as he cuts into you 
later."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
